verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> [A Psalm] of David אָ֘מַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> hath said נָבָ֣ל <S%H5036><s%> The fool בְּ֭לִבּוֹ <S%H3820><s%> in his heart אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> There אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> [There is] no God הִֽשְׁחִ֗יתוּ <S%H7843><s%> They are corrupt הִֽתְעִ֥יבוּ <S%H8581><s%> they have done abominable עֲלִילָ֗ה <S%H5949><s%> works אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> is no עֹֽשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> [there is] none that doeth טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> good

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מִשָּׁמַיִם֮ <S%H8064><s%> from heaven הִשְׁקִ֪יף <S%H8259><s%> looked down עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> upon the children אָ֫דָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> of men לִ֭רְאוֹת <S%H7200><s%> to see הֲיֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> if there מַשְׂכִּ֑יל <S%H7919><s%> were any that did understand דֹּ֝רֵשׁ <S%H1875><s%> [and] seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> God

הַכֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> have all סָר֮ <S%H5493><s%> They are all gone aside יַחְדָּ֪ו <S%H3162><s%> they are [all] together נֶ֫אֱלָ֥חוּ <S%H444><s%> become filthy אֵ֤ין <S%H369><s%> There עֹֽשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> [there is] none that doeth ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good אֵ֝֗ין <S%H369><s%> is no גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> even אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> no not one

הֲלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יָדְעוּ֮ <S%H3045><s%> no knowledge כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פֹּ֪עֲלֵ֫י <S%H6466><s%> Have all the workers אָ֥וֶן <S%H205><s%> of iniquity אֹכְלֵ֣י <S%H398><s%> ? who eat up עַ֭מִּי <S%H5971><s%> my people אָ֣כְלוּ <S%H398><s%> [as] they eat לֶ֑חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> not upon the LORD לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not קָרָֽאוּ׃ <S%H7121><s%> and call

שָׁ֤ם ׀ <S%H8033><s%> There פָּ֣חֲדוּ <S%H6342><s%> fear פָ֑חַד <S%H6343><s%> There were they in great כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> for God בְּד֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> [is] in the generation צַדִּֽיק׃ <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous

עֲצַת־ <S%H6098><s%> the counsel עָנִ֥י <S%H6041><s%> of the poor תָבִ֑ישׁוּ <S%H954><s%> Ye have shamed כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> But יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> because the LORD מַחְסֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H4268><s%> [is] his refuge

מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Oh יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> Oh that מִצִּיּוֹן֮ <S%H6726><s%> [were come] out of Zion יְשׁוּעַ֪ת <S%H3444><s%> the salvation יִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> bringeth back יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> when the LORD שְׁב֣וּת <S%H7622><s%> the captivity עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> of his people יָגֵ֥ל <S%H1523><s%> shall rejoice יַ֝עֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob יִשְׂמַ֥ח <S%H8055><s%> shall be glad יִשְׂרָֽאֵל׃ <S%H3478><s%> [and] Israel
